name: moonwolf.io
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Fiat money is hyper-inflationary, issued by a centralized, non-transparent entity. WOLF is a deflationary, decentralized, transparent token. We want to reduce the money our users waste by minimizing gas fees, while maintaining decentralization.
